title: taNikaittalam Ongi
sahitya:
taNikaittalam Ongi paNivOr tamait-tAngi tigazhum vaDivazhagan pugazhinaip-pOTruvOm


anupallavi

  piNiyEdum ini emmai aNugAda aruL Indu aNaiyum iNai illAda tuNaiyAvAn avan


caraNam    tol vinaip-payanAl tOnri emait-toDarum tollai ellAm tIra tuDaittOTTi viDuvAn
nalladoru peruvAzhvai mAm aDaiyat-tannaruLai nalgiDat-tayangAda nAthanAvAn avan
